timeline.bodyText:
This is an interesting usage and it works...
Do we need to add an RPC interface for checking whether a time series exist?
timeline.author: jixuan1989

replies.bodyText: For JDBC, users can use sql SHOW TIMESERIES, for session native API, use the new method checkTimeseriesExists . If no other scenes, I think this is appropriate at present (as a tool method).
replies.author: vesense
